assessment.title: She’s got green eyes (Unit 5, Lesson 3)
assessment.helpText:
The aim of the game is to escape the maze by forming a correct sentence that ends on one of the edges of the grid.

From each square you can only move to one of the highlighted squares.
Choose the only word that can correctly follow the word in the square that you are in and click on it.
Move one square at a time, forming a sentence, until you reach one of the edges of the grid or until it is impossible to extend your sentence further.
Click on Submit.

To undo your selections click on the squares you want to deselect in the reverse order to that in which you selected them (they will be numbered).
If you make a mistake and submit an incorrect answer, you will have to try again later.

If you click on Reveal, the sentence will be shown for two seconds, and then you’ll be able to resume playing.

In the Single player game find all of the sentences in the shortest time possible.

In the Two player game players take turns to play. Player 1 plays first.
The first player to score three points is the winner.
